name: Tamagotchi Moodlet
description: Sims-style moodlet tracker for life progress. Track hygiene, nutrition, hydration, productivity, health, and finances. Syncs with pet and todo widgets.
author: StickerNest

setMoodlet.description: Set a specific moodlet {category: string, value: number, reason?: string, duration?: number}

taskCompleted.description: Notify that a task was completed {category: string, task: string, impact?: number}

resetMoodlet.description: Reset a specific moodlet category to neutral

moodChanged.description: Emitted when overall mood changes {mood: string, intensity: number, moodlets: object}

moodletUpdated.description: Emitted when a single moodlet updates {category: string, value: number, reason: string}

taskCategoryUpdated.description: Emitted when a task category is affected
